markdownRemark.html:
Mexico

  • A shoal of flying fish. The fish travel underwater and it looks like a really big fish. Every minute one jumps out of the water and interrupts your thoughts with fish.

  • "For here or to go?" the taco lady asks. But what does "for here" mean for a taco stand on wheels? Around the stand there's a wooden ledge; we eat with everyone else in a football huddle.

  • The Atlantic in Canada is dark and cold. The Atlantic in Holbox is baby blue and warm as the womb.

  • The coast forms a wide, shallow pan, water knee-deep. We sat in the ocean to watch the sunset, and soon we were sitting inside the sunset, orange ripples lapping at our shoulders.

  • "Everybody look to the left, everybody look to the right"

  • A beach made of purely seashells

  • A house cat named Maria

  • Aliens descended and tried to recreate a hotel room

  • Cuttlefish, hermit crab, urchins, a fish in the color of a Web3 button, a yellow male and a harem of smaller yellow females,

  • Snorkel tan: exactly one half of my body was burning afterwards. The back side of my legs, the top side of my arms.

  • Coral are unspecialized, made of the same type of cell over and over. How come it has patterns on a macroscopic scale? Do the cells all follow the same procedural instructions? Is it analogous to a salt crystal?

    • What is this class of algorithms? Hidden markov models?

  • Can the metaverse generate the same amount of surprise?

    • We eat in a football huddle, sauces and plates on a ledge around the stand.
